dct_title_s: World LNG map : 2016 edition / produced by Petroleum Economist in association with Shell ; designed by K. Fuller and P. Bush. (Map)
dct_description_sm: Shows gas fields, gas pipelines, liquefied natural gas import terminals, liquefied natural gas export plants, floating LNG vessels, offshore terminals, importer countries, exporter countries, and both importer and exporter countries. Title from panel. "Petroleum Economist Cartographic." "Designed, produced and distributed by: Petroleum Economist." "©Petroleum Economist, March 2016". "Published March 2016"--Panel. Includes 7 inset maps, 2 ancillary world maps, statistical tables, 1 graph, and color illustrations. Insets: LNG terminals & plants: US East Coast -- LNG terminals & plants: US Gulf of Mexico -- LNG terminals & plants: East Mediterranean -- LNG terminals: Southwest Europe -- LNG terminals: Qatar and United Arab Emirates -- LNG terminals: China -- LNG terminals: Japan. Ancillaries: LNG exporting countries as at March 2016 -- LNH importing countries as at March 2016. Statistical tables: LNG trade movements, 2014 -- LNG vessel order book (2016-2022) -- LNG world trade. Graph: World export plants and world import terminals by capacity (as at March 2016). Title panel and color advertisement for Shell on verso.
